system.special: Daemon Wep, Corrosive, Recharge, Spray, Toxic (3)
system.note: Weapon: Staff. Daemon WP 34 (Lesser Nurgle Daemon), Bind Str 2 . Att.: Stream of Corruption. Two-handed, must be dedicated to Nurgle to wield. Can make a [Melee] Attack.
